code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Search=_ref=>{let{filterBooks}=_ref;const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const handleSearchChange=e=>{setSearchTerm(e.target.value);};const handleSearchClick=()=>{filterBooks(searchTerm.trim());};const handleKeyPress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){handleSearchClick();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'flex-start',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:'20px',color:'white'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchTerm,onChange:handleSearchChange,onKeyPress:handleKeyPress,placeholder:"Search by book name",style:{padding:'15px',fontSize:'1.2rem',borderRadius:'5px',border:'1px solid #ccc',width:'83rem',backgroundColor:'#f8f9fa',color:'#333'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearchClick,style:{padding:'15px 30px',marginLeft:'10px',fontSize:'1rem',borderRadius:'5px',backgroundColor:'#007BFF',color:'white',border:'none',cursor:'pointer',boxShadow:'0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'},children:"Search"})]});};export default Search;//Search.test.js
